desc: Fasthorse Creations is an indigenous, woman, mother, and survivor-owned self-care initiative emphasizing ethically sourced, locally harvested, sustainable ingredients. We make good things, at ethical prices, individually tailored to you and your needs.

layout.text: Creating all-natural products by hand, with the body, home, and heart in mind. All items hand made, with dedicated accuracy for the home and hearth without perfection. Hand melted, poured, labeled, whipped, and mailed, from the Fasthorse family with love.
